detail.content: Shirky: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        About Tisch Leadership Team A Brief History Tisch and the Community Faculty Interdisciplinary Collaborations The NYU and Tisch Campus New York City Life Getting Here  home > About Tisch          Interactive Telecommunications   Clay Shirky Associate Teacher Phone: 212 992 9340 Email: clay@shirky.com Website: http://shirky.com Office: 721 Broadway, 4th Fl  Courses Design Expo Social Software Design for UNICEF   Thinking about Networks Network Effects Studio (Social Software) Social Facts: Motivation Education BA, Yale University Biography Currently focusing on social software and peer-to-peer technologies, and the ways electronic networks shape the social lives of the groups that form there, and vice-versa. Clay writes extensively about the Internet, and his writings have appeared in the IEEE Computer magazine, FEED , the New York Times , the Wall Street Journal , the Harvard Business Review , and Business 2.0 , among others. He also works as a consultant, and his current and former clients include Nokia, Barnes and Noble, the Markle Foundation, the BBC, and the Library of Congress. He publishes a monthly newsletter called "Networks, Economics, and Culture", and his essays are being collected into a book, to be published by O'Reilly and Associates. Clay writes extensively about the Internet, and his writings have appeared in the IEEE Computer magazine, FEED , the New York Times , the Wall Street Journal , the Harvard Business Review , and Business 2.0 , among others. He also works as a consultant, and his current and former clients include Nokia, Barnes and Noble, the Markle Foundation, the BBC, and the Library of Congress. He publishes a monthly newsletter called "Networks, Economics, and Culture", and his essays are being collected into a book, to be published by O'Reilly and Associates.
